name: bio-hack-2026
description: Unified entry point for Bio-Hack 2026 project

scripts.api:dev: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.dashboard:dev: cd dashboard && source venv/bin/activate && streamlit run app.py
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run api:dev" "npm run app:dev" "npm run dashboard:dev"
